scripts.build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3333 && npm run client:dev"
scripts.install: cd ./server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.cypress:test: wait-on http://localhost:3000 && cd ./client && npm run cypress:run
scripts.prep: npm run client:build && npm run server:build
scripts.dev:test: concurrently "npm run server:dev" "wait-on tcp:3333 && npm run client:dev" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && npm run cypress:open"
